# warnings

**Instance Property**

The collection of warnings the validator encountered.

## Declaration

```swift
var warnings: [AVCaptionConversionWarning] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value may change while the validator’s status is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionConversionValidator/Status-swift.enum/validating].

## Validating captions

- **validateCaptionConversion(warningHandler:)**: Validates the object’s captions.
- **AVCaptionConversionWarning**: An object that represents a conversion warning produced by a validator.
- **stopValidating()**: Stops the active validation operation.

items.description: An object that represents a conversion warning produced by a validator.
